alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 4:15PM EST until December 24 at 1:40PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 03/29/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 3 pm: 7.6 Forecast: Fri 7 pm 5.5 Sat 1 am 11.1 Sat 7 am 11.1 Sat 1 pm 10.2 Sat 7 pm 10.1 Sun 1 am 10.0 Sun 7 am 9.9 Sun 1 pm 9.7 Sun 7 pm 9.5 Mon 1 am 9.2 Mon 7 am 8.9 Mon 1 pm MSG &&
